headline.main: U.S. BOMBERS RAID ANDAMAN ISLANDS; 4-Engined Machines Attack Ships at Ports 300 Miles Southwest of Rangoon DOCKS AT HONG KONG HIT Chennault Lists Victories of Air Force in China, Records for a Week and a Month

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, July 31 (AP) -- United States four-engined bombers raided the Andaman Islands, 300 miles southwest of Rangoon, on Thursday, bombing a 300-foot steamer at Chatham Island and setting off a tremendous explosion that destroyed many buildings, a communique announced today.
abstract: Burma campaign: RAF raids Tazaw, Kwazon, Indin, Shiho and Atot Manra; Allied fighter planes hit 10 supply sampans, Kalemyo area
